mapper.select: SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS ROWNUM, PNO, PSUBJECT, POSTERNAME, CRE_DATE, REPOST, PVIEWS, BYUSER FROM ( SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS ROWNUM, PNO, PSUBJECT, POSTERNAME, CRE_DATE, REPOST, PVIEWS, BYUSER FROM BOARD ORDER BY REPOST DESC, PNO DESC) AS ROWBOARD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(PSUBJECT, PTEXT, PPWD, POSTERNAME, CRE_DATE, MOD_DATE) VALUES (#{postSubject}, #{postText}, #{postPassword}, #{posterName}, NOW(), NOW())
INSERT INTO board(PSUBJECT, PTEXT, CRE_DATE, MOD_DATE, BYUSER) VALUES (#{postSubject}, #{postText}, NOW(), NOW(), #{postUserNo})
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM BOARD WHERE PNO=#{postNo} and PPWD=#{postPassword}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET PSUBJECT = #{postSubject}, PTEXT = #{postText}, PPWD = #{postPassword}, POSTERNAME = #{posterName}, MOD_DATE = now() WHERE PNO = #{postNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(PSUBJECT, PTEXT, PPWD, POSTERNAME, CRE_DATE, MOD_DATE, REPOST) VALUES (#{postSubject}, #{postText}, #{postPassword}, #{posterName}, NOW(), NOW(), #{repost})
INSERT INTO BOARD(PSUBJECT, PTEXT, CRE_DATE, MOD_DATE, REPOST, BYUSER) VALUES (#{postSubject}, #{postText}, NOW(), NOW(), #{repost}, #{postUserNo})
